CustomField.description: If Campaign 'Type' = Fundraising Page and the 'External System Link' field contains 'twofeetheartbeat' then this field returns "Two Feet Heartbeat Fundraising Page"
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Fundraising Page") && CONTAINS(External_System_Link__c,"twofeetheartbeat"), "Two Feet Heartbeat Fundraising Page",NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Campaign 'Type' = Fundraising Page and the 'External System Link' field contains 'twofeetheartbeat' then this field returns "Two Feet Heartbeat Fundraising Page"
CustomField.label: Fundraising Campaign Name
